DOC.brief_summary: This was an unblinded randomized controlled trial. Women were randomized to uterine closure with the knotless barbed suture (Stratafix PDS, Ethicon) or Vicryl (Ethicon) at the time of elective cesarean. The primary outcome was closure time of the uterine incision. Also measured were blood loss during incision closure and the use of additional hemostatic sutures. Informed consent was obtained
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Barbed and Non-barbed Suture for Uterine Incision Closure at Cesarean Section
